channel.title: How do i make dark bow distance shoot
channel.description:
my dark bow needs to be right next to the target to shoot arrows and wont shoot when 3 squares or 2 or morew away
how do i fix that
*please help* *thx* *THX* *thx*

item.title: How do i make dark bow distance shoot
item.dc:creator: @masta_XY masta XY
item.description:
@masta_XY wrote:

[quote=“ingo345, post:1, topic:252450”]my dark bow needs to be right next to the target to shoot arrows and wont shoot when 3 squares or 2 or morew away

how do i fix that

please help
thx
THX
thx[/quote]

Mean’s that its not a ranging device, you need to make it use the bow.
